#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define ll long long
#define mod 1000000007
#define si(i) scanf("%lld",&i);
#define pi(i) printf("%lld",i);
#define rep(i,st,end) for(i=st;i<end;i++) 


int main(){
    
    #ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    	freopen("in","r",stdin);
    	freopen("out","w",stdout);
	#endif
    
	ll t;
	si(t);
	while(t--){
		string s;
		ll k,n;
		cin>>s>>k;
		n=s.size();
		ll arr[n];
		for(ll i=0;i<s.size();i++) arr[i]=(s[i]-'0');

		ll i=0,tmp=0;

		while(i<n){
			tmp+=arr[i];
			i++;
			if(i<n && tmp<k){
				tmp*=10;
				tmp+=arr[i];
				i++;
			}
			tmp%=k;
			tmp*=10;
		}

		if(tmp==0) printf("YES\n");
		else printf("NO\n");

	}
    return 0;
}
